events.message: I just received the headphones I ordered, but one side is completely silent and doesn’t produce any sound at all.
The issue has been reviewed and categorized as a product defect due to the reported faulty headphone.
Your case has been assigned to a support agent who will assist you further with your defective product.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your headphones. Let’s work together to get this fixed as soon as possible.
Could you please confirm the order number and let me know if there are any visible damages or scratches on the product packaging?
The order number is 54321, and the packaging looks fine with no scratches or damage. The problem is definitely inside the device.
Thank you for the information. We can offer you a replacement or a full refund for the defective headphones. Please let us know your preference.
I’d prefer a replacement if possible, since I really like this model and hope the new one works properly.
We’ve processed your replacement order and you should receive the new headphones within the next 5 business days. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Just checking in to make sure you have received the replacement headphones and that everything is working correctly now.
Yes, I received the new pair today and they work perfectly. Thank you for the quick replacement and excellent support!
We are glad your issue has been resolved. This case is now closed, but please don’t hesitate to contact us if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your support experience. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
